short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This chrome extension allows you to conveniently remember and keep track of sites you've visited with a personal note.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A smart and simple way to store links that are important to you!

Never again will you forget why you saved a link for later, as LinkShelf allows you to save your current tab with a personalized message.

Features:
- Persistent storage, so you can still have access to all your saved links when you close and reopen Chrome
- A simple UI that creates a seamless user experience

Source code for this project: https://github.com/HassaanAbbasi/LinkShelf
